hero.label: Warehousing
hero.title: Strategic warehousing for your supply chain
hero.subtitle: Secure spaces and advanced technology to manage your inventory.

pitch.text: At YOBEL we offer warehousing solutions designed to optimize your supply chain. Our distribution centers feature cutting-edge technology and trained staff to ensure the security and availability of your inventory.

items.title: General Warehousing
items.desc: Spacious and secure spaces for all types of merchandise, with real-time inventory control.

items.title: Climate-Controlled Storage
items.desc: Temperature-controlled facilities for products that require special conditions.

items.title: Cross-Docking
items.desc: Direct merchandise transfer without prolonged storage, reducing time and costs.

items.title: Inventory Management
items.desc: Precise stock control with advanced WMS systems and real-time reports.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Maximize your supply chain efficiency with our warehousing solutions.
items: Reduced operating costs through space optimization.
Total inventory visibility with WMS technology.
Flexibility to scale according to your needs.
24/7 security with surveillance systems and access control.

processes.subtitle: Your inventory, our priority
processes.title: We manage your warehousing from start to finish, ensuring precision, security and efficiency in every operation.
processes.label: Processes

items.title: Reception
items.desc: Verification and registration of incoming merchandise with quality control.

items.title: Storage
items.desc: Strategic product placement based on rotation and characteristics.

items.title: Picking and Packing
items.desc: Order preparation with precision and speed.

items.title: Dispatch
items.desc: Coordination of shipments with complete documentation and traceability.

items.question: What types of products can you store?
items.answer: We store a wide variety of products: dry goods, refrigerated items, pharmaceuticals, electronics and more.

items.question: How can I monitor my inventory?
items.answer: We offer access to our WMS system where you can view your inventory in real-time.

items.question: Do you have warehouses in multiple cities?
items.answer: Yes, we have a network of strategically located distribution centers.

items.question: What is the minimum contract period?
items.answer: We offer flexibility in our contracts, adapting to your specific needs.
